item.Q:
Write the character:
(particle in old Chinese similar to 啊)
item.A:
兮 (strokes unavailable)
xī

彼 (strokes unavailable)
bǐ
彼此 bǐcǐ each other; one another

item.Q:
Write the character:
to pick; to pluck; to collect; to select; to choose; to gather
item.A:
traditional: 採
cǎi
采用 (採用) cǎiyòng to adopt; to employ; to use

item.Q:
Write the character:
to arrive at (place or time); period; to become due; classifier for events, meetings, elections, sporting fixtures etc
item.A:
届 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 屆
jiè
本届 (本屆) běnjiè current; this year

item.Q:
Write the character:
Buddhist nun; (often used in phonetic spellings)
item.A:
尼 (strokes unavailable)
ní

辈 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 輩
bèi
一辈子 (一輩子) yībèizi (for) a lifetime

traditional: 藥
yào
药品 (藥品) yàopǐn medicaments; medicine; drug

绿 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 綠
lǜ
绿色 (綠色) lǜsè green

item.Q:
Write the character:
surname Tong; boy; child; children
item.A:
童 (strokes unavailable)
tóng

item.Q:
Write the character:
to withdraw; to pull back; to contract; to shrink; to reduce; abbreviation
item.A:
缩 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 縮
suō
缩小 (縮小) suōxiǎo reduce; decrease

item.Q:
Write the character:
mark; sign; talisman; to seal; to correspond to; tally; symbol; written charm; to coincide; surname Fu
item.A:
符 (strokes unavailable)
fú
符合 fúhé in keeping with; in accordance with; to agree with; to correspond with; to be in line with; manage; to handle

item.Q:

to catch; to obtain; to capture
item.A:
traditional: 獲
huò
获得 (獲得) huòdé to obtain; to receive; to get

mò

item.Q:

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: to prohibit; to forbid
2: endure
item.A:
禁 (strokes unavailable)
1: jìn 2: jīn
禁止 jìnzhǐ to prohibit 不禁 bùjīn can't help (doing sth); can't refrain from

pó
老婆 lǎopó (informal) wife

1: child's cry
2: draw back corners of mouth
item.A:
咧 (strokes unavailable)
1: liē 2: liě

item.Q:
Write the character: gǔ

item.A:
股 (strokes unavailable)
share; portion; section; part; thigh; (classifier for smells or electric current); whiff
股东 (股東) gǔdōng stockholder

traditional: 採用
cǎiyòng to adopt; to employ; to use

traditional: 採取
cǎiqǔ to adopt or carry out (measures, policies, course of action); to take

traditional: 獲得
huòdé to obtain; to receive; to get
fúhé in keeping with; in accordance with; to agree with; to correspond with; to be in line with; manage; to handle

traditional: 兒童
értóng child
jìnzhǐ to prohibit
bǐcǐ each other; one another

traditional: 縮小
suōxiǎo reduce; decrease

traditional: 符號
fúhào symbol; mark; sign

traditional: 數目
shùmù amount; number

traditional: 紅色
hóngsè red (color); revolutionary

traditional: 為此
wèicǐ for this reason; with regards to this; in this respect; in order to do this; to this end

traditional: 率領
shuàilǐng lead; command; head
dàxíng large scale; wide scale; broad scale

traditional: 樹木
shùmù trees
hétong (business) contract

traditional: 確實
quèshí indeed; really; reliable; real; true

traditional: 不見
bùjiàn not see; not meet
bújiàn not see
zhíde to be worth; to deserve

traditional: 戰線
zhànxiàn battle line; battlefront; front
